霒字的基本解释

霒
yīn
古同“阴”，云遮日。

霒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīn］
［《廣韻》於金切，平侵，影。］
“侌1”的今字。“1”的今字。“阴1”的繁体字。亦作“阥1”。亦作“隂1”。亦作“霒1”。亦作“霠1”。
(1)水的南面或山的北面。
(2)泛指北面。
(3)不见阳光的地方。
(4)幽暗，昏暗。
(5)背面。
(6)凹进的。
(7)阴影。
(8)日影。
(9)借指光阴。
(10)天空中十分之八以上的部分被中低云量占住叫做阴。
(11)指云块。
(12)冥冥之中。借指鬼神。
(13)夜。参见“陰陽”。
(14)雨。
(15)阴湿；润泽。
(16)水。
(17)负。与“正”相对。
(18)今指带负电的。
(19)隐藏；不露在外面的。
(20)暗暗地；偷偷地。
(21)阴险。
(22)脸色阴沉不悦貌。
(23)熄灭；哑。
(24)冷，寒冷。
(25)指秋冬季节。
(26)月亮。
(27)小；弱小。
(28)指小人，人格卑鄙的人。
(29)偶数。

霒字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霒； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1375第27
【玉篇】古文隂字。【說文】雲覆日也。从雲今聲。註詳阜部八畫。　【集韻】書作?。或作??。【廣韻】書作霠。

霒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
霒字的起名意思

暂无。

Gai
Basic explanation of words
Gai
yīn
In ancient times, it was "yin", and clouds covered the sun.
Gai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīn］
["Guangyun" Yu Jinqie, flat invasion, shadow. ]
The present character of "侌1". The present character of "1". Traditional characters for "阴1". Also known as "阥1". Also known as "Yin 1". Also known as "霒1". Also known as "霠1".
(1) The south of the water or the north of the mountain.
(2) Refers to the north in general.
(3) A place where there is no sunlight.
(4) Dim and dim.
(5) The back.
(6) Recessed.
(7) Shadows.
(8) Sun shadow.
(9) By referring to time.
(10) More than eight-tenths of the sky is occupied by medium and low cloud cover and is called overcast.
(11) Refers to cloud blocks.
(12) In the dark. By referring to ghosts and gods.
(13) Night. See "yin and yang".
(14) Rain.
(15) Humidity; moisturizing.
(16) Water.
(17) Negative. Contrast with "positive".
(18) Today refers to negatively charged.
(19) Hidden; not exposed.
(20) Secretly; secretly.
(21) Sinister.
(22) The face is gloomy and unhappy.
(23) Extinguished; dumb.
(24) Cold, cold.
(25) Refers to the autumn and winter seasons.
(26) The moon.
(27) Small; weak.
(28) Refers to the villain, a person with a mean personality.
(29) Even number.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　霒; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1375 Page 27
[Jade articles] Yin words in ancient texts. [Said the text] Clouds cover the sun. From the cloud today sound. Note the eight paintings of Fubu in detail.　【Jiyun】Book writing?. Or as ??. [Guang Yun] The book is written as a scorpion.
